scan_metadata.description: workdocs - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks if administrators are defined using IAM
check_functions.description: Ensures administrators are defined using IAM for WorkDocs

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks if MFA is enabled for users
check_functions.description: Ensures MFA is enabled for WorkDocs users

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks IP range access settings
check_functions.description: Validates IP range access for WorkDocs

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks shareable links settings
check_functions.description: Validates shareable links configuration for WorkDocs

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors last access time for users
check_functions.description: Checks last access time for WorkDocs users

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors inactive user status
check_functions.description: Checks and sets users as inactive in WorkDocs
